game.title: A Test of Strength
game.objective: Prove your strength to the mighty warrior, Thekraton.
game.description: Thekraton, the greatest warrior in the land, has challenged you to a test of strength. Defeat him in battle and earn his respect.
game.reward: The Warrior's Axe, a powerful weapon that once belonged to Thekraton.

task.objective: Travel to Thekraton's training grounds, located in the mountains to the east.
task.description: Thekraton's training grounds are a sacred place where he trains his warriors. You must travel there to face him in battle.
Thekraton is a powerful warrior, but you must defeat him to prove your strength. Use all of your skills and abilities to defeat him in battle.

task.objective: Return to Thekraton and claim your reward.
task.description: Once you have defeated Thekraton, return to him to claim your reward. He will bestow upon you the Warrior's Axe, a powerful weapon that once belonged to him.
